fields.name: timeMode
fields.description: Time Transfer Mode: 0 Disabled, 1 Survey In, 2 Fixed Mode (true position information required), 3-255 Reserved

fields.name: flags
fields.description: Time mode flags: bit 0: lla (Position is given in LAT/LON/ALT (default is ECEF)), bit 1: altInv (Altitude is not valid, in case lla was set)

fields.name: ecefXOrLat
fields.description: WGS84 ECEF X coordinate or latitude, depending on flags above

fields.name: ecefYOrLon
fields.description: WGS84 ECEF Y coordinate or longitude, depending on flags above

fields.name: ecefZOrAlt
fields.description: WGS84 ECEF Z coordinate or altitude, depending on flags above
